columns.id: The unique identifier for each mountain.
columns.name: The name of the mountain.
columns.Height: The elevation of the mountain above sea level.
columns.Prominence: The height of the mountain's summit relative to surrounding terrain.
columns.Range: The mountain range to which the mountain belongs.
columns.Country: The country where the mountain is located.

mountain.table_description: The table stores information about mountains and their characteristics.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each camera lens.
columns.brand: The manufacturer or brand of the camera lens.
columns.name: The specific model name of the camera lens.
columns.focal_length_mm: The focal length of the lens in millimeters.
columns.max_aperture: The maximum aperture value of the lens.

camera_lens.table_description: The table details characteristics of various camera lenses.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each photo.
columns.camera_lens_id: The identifier of the camera lens used to take the photo.
columns.mountain_id: The identifier of the mountain featured in the photo.
columns.color: The color representation used in the photo.
columns.name: The descriptive name of the photo.

photos.table_description: The table captures photos of mountains with associated characteristics.
